item.description:
Sorry - we are full!

MLK long weekend (Friday, Jan 16 - Monday January 19) at Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club!

Guest Fees are $20 pp per night.

Friday, Jan 16

  • Arrive after 9 PM to meet and greet us
  • BYOB



Saturday, Jan 17
Ski at

  • Cranmore (5 minutes drive )
  • Attitash or Wildcat or Black (20 minutes drive)
  • Bretton Woods (45 minutes drive)
  • Sunday River (1 hour drive )
  • or Cross Country Ski in Jackson, NH (15 min drive)
  • or Snowshoe
  • or Ice Climb
  • or winter hike


(Optional) Saturday PM 4 - 7 Apres-Ski event "Southern Hospitality"
- A Wedeln Guest Pass and a Social Invite ($12) required prior to entry

(Optional) Saturday 9PM - 1AM - Apres-Ski event Live band
- A Wedeln Guest Pass and a Social Invite ($12) required prior to entry

Sunday, Jan 18
AM - Ski or sleep in (I'm choosing the latter)
PM 4- 7 Wedeln Chilifest
- A Wedeln Guest Pass and a Social Invite ($12) required prior to entry
- Members, Guests, and sister houses can compete in a chili cook-off contest. Make your chili and put it in a crockpot
- or just sample all the chilis and choose the one you like best.
- There is also an opportunity to vote on the best named chili (i.e. "Colon Cleaner"; "Thai one on")
- There will be live entertainment as well

Monday, Jan 19
AM - Get up and get one last day of skiing in or shop or sleep in
PM - Head for home

(Optional) Meals
The meal package is $25pp and includes Sat & Sun breakfasts and Saturday dinner.

Menus:
Saturday Breakfast will include an Omelet Station!

Dinner
Ceasar Salad
Chicken and Broccoli Ziti with Alfredo
Garlic Bread
Soup
Cakes


Summary of costs
- 3 nights * $20 = $60
- 3 Apres Ski events * $12 = $36
- Breakfast Saturday AM Dinner Saturday Night Breakfast Sunday AM = $25
Total = $121

When you rsvp - you will be charged $60 for 3 nights stay. Refunds only if you cancel by Friday, January 9, 2008. Cancellations after this date are not refunded.

Please note in your rsvp comments if you want dinner. If you rsvp for dinner and cancel, you will still be charged for dinner unless you can find a replacement.

Note: if you are already a Full member of the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club, please RSVP "NO" and save the spot for a new meetup guest. But please feel free to write a little comment that you are coming up. Thanks

This meetup is limited to 10 meetup guests as I expect a full house.

Directions will be made available to yes RSVPs...

NOTE - On Star, Garmin, or other GPS devices will NOT work...

Thanks,
Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: Just come in the door - you'll find us!
item.name: Chilifest Weekend @ Wedeln Ski and Outdoor Club
